Food Delivery + Recycling.missionStatement: Develop the capability to turn every object back into its base components with 100% efficiency

possibleSolutions: Automated drone swarm collection system that users can interface with to highlight trash for collection

difficulties.description: Technological development required for 100% recycling rate
possibleSolutions: Robotics for breaking down larger garbage pieces

difficulties.description: Selling recycled commodities at a profit
possibleSolutions: Get running costs of recycling plants as low as possible by relying on automation
Use recycled materials for in-house purposes where possible (3d printing for robot parts, clothing for advertising)
Explore use cases for undesired recycled commodities

difficulties.description: Reaching recycling flow required for 100% rate (if it's too slow, there will be landfill buildup)
possibleSolutions: Automation for sorting and running factories consistently
Modular factories that can scale to meet changing demands (i.e. If there are higher rates of electronic devices, local factors will need more units for recycling electronic devices)

roadmapHeaders: Phase 1: Sell technology to existing recycling plants and dumps
entries: Phase 1.1: Software aspects
Sorting technology (computer vision model, arm controller, etc)
Dump layout software to help minimize environmental harm due to leachate
Phase 1.2: Hardware aspects
Robotics for breaking down larger garbage pieces
Sensor technology for better sorting
Phase 2: Develop recycling technology and run dump + recycling plant
Phase 2.1: Modular factories that can scale as needed
Iterating on existing technology
Get running costs of recycling plants as low as possible by relying on automation
Automation for sorting and running factories consistently
Phase 2.2: Explore use cases for undesired recycled commodities
Use recycled materials for in-house purposes where possible (3d printing for robot parts, clothing for advertising)
Phase 3: Collecting trash
Phase 3.1: Simplifying collection
Standardized collection bins
Accessible disposal sites
Phase 3.2: Obsoleting collection
Automated drone swarm collection system that users can interface with to highlight trash for collection
Phase 4 and beyond: Transform into general commodities company (once reusability threshold passes 100%)
Mine asteroids
Move basic raw material processing to space
